question.title: Quarkus - problem image with Qute and mailer and set image file for template
question.body:
I have a problem when execute service, I have image in the next path META-INF/resources/quarkus-logo.png, I have next method example:

    @Inject
    Mailer mailer; 

    @GET
    @Path("/html")
    public void sendingHTML() {
        String body = "<strong>Hello!</strong>" + "\n" +
                "<p>Here is an image for you: <img id=\"quarkus-logo\" src=\"cid:my-image@quarkus.io\"/></p>" +
                "<p>Regards</p>";
        mailer.send(Mail.withHtml("example@gmail.com", "An email in HTML", body)
                .addInlineAttachment("quarkus-logo.png",
                        new File(String.valueOf(quarkus-logo.png"))),
                        "image/png", "<my-image@quarkus.io>"));
    }

but i have error:io.vertx.core.file.FileSystemException: Unable to open file at path '/home/user/quarkus/email-api/quarkus-logo.png'

I tried with getClass().getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("quarkus-logo.png"), but wen jar compile, I had same error.

My class is into package test.quarkus.resource, Does anyone know any other way?
